childMarkdownRemark.html:
Established in 1963 in Palazzolo sull'Oglio, Pedrali is an Italian company that produces contemporary design furniture for contract and residential markets.

Our collection is the result of rigorous and careful research realized in the creation of industrial design products made of metal, plastic, and wood as well as upholstery.

A quality-oriented manufacturing process, scrupulous sourcing of certified raw materials, research and a true passion for cutting-edge machinery anchor our production values. Combined with step by step planning in every phase and the precision typical of a craftsman, this blend of elements have made Pedrali a world-class creator of contemporary industrial design.

internal.content:

siteMetadata.title: Loop Architectural Materials
siteMetadata.description: Design & technical partner to the Arizona A+D community, Loop Architectural Materials represents leading brands in contract furniture, glass, and architectural/interior design products.
